ARABIC: ثُمَّ نُنَجِّى ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوا۟ وَّنَذَرُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ فِيهَا جِثِيًّا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then We will rescue those who had taqwa and We will leave the wrongdoers in it on their knees.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We shall deliver those who took heed for themselves, and leave the evil-doers kneeling there.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then We shall deliver those that feared Allah and leave the wrong-doers there on their knees.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We will save the pious ones from the hell fire and leave the unjust people therein in crowded groups.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We shall then rescue the pious – and leave the unjust in it, fallen on their knees.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then We shall save those who had Taqwa. And We shall leave the wrongdoers in it, Jithiyya.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We will deliver those who guarded (against evil), and We will leave the unjust therein on their knees.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then We shall deliver those that were godfearing; and the evildoers We shall leave there, hobbling on their knees.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then We shall rescue those who kept from evil, and leave the evil-doers crouching there.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then We shall save those who feared God, but the wrongdoers shall be left there on their knees.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then We shall deliver those who have feared, and shall have the wrong-doers therein kneeling. *Chapter: 19
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then We will deliver those who are Godwary, and leave the wrongdoers in it, fallen on their knees.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But We shall save those who guarded against evil, and We shall leave the wrong-doers therein, (humbled) to their knees.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then We shall save those who use to fear Allah and were dutiful to Him. And We shall leave the Zalimun (polytheists and wrongdoers, etc.) therein (humbled) to their knees (in Hell).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Then, We will save those who were cautious of Us, but the harmdoers shall be left there hobbling on their knees.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then We will rescue those who were devout, and leave the wrongdoers in it, on their knees.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then We will save those who feared Allah and leave the wrongdoers within it, on their knees.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:72] Then We will deliver (read nunajjī or nunjī) those who were wary, of [committing] idolatry or disbelief, [We will deliver them] from it, and leave those who did wrong, by way of idolatry and disbelief, crouching therein, on their knees.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then We shall rescue those who kept from evil) those who ward off disbelief, idolatry and indecency, (and leave the evil-doers) the idolaters (crouching) all gathered for eternity (there) in hell.
